job.title: Mid Software Engineer (Java backend/React)
job.description:
1. looking to bring on 2 full stack engineers to help build their inventory service
  2. More into back-end focused using Java 11-14 (bonus if they are willing to learn Golang)
  3. Front end experience with preferably React.js is ideal; secondary would be Angular/Vue.js
  4. Wanted folks w/public cloud experience in a production setting (Azure preferred, AWS).
